price: Shin wanin Addinin Allah suke nẽma, alhãli kuwa a gare Shi ne waɗanda ke cikin sama da ƙasa suka sallama wa, a kan sõ da ƙĩ, kuma zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da su?
arabic: أَفَغَيۡرَ دِينِ ٱللَّهِ يَبۡغُونَ وَلَهُۥٓ أَسۡلَمَ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡعٗا وَكَرۡهٗا وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: afaghayra dīni al-lahi yabghūna walahu aslama man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ṭawʿan wakarhan wa-ilayhi yur'jaʿūna
